ValidationRule.description: Frequency Cycle can not be less than or equal to zero Frequency Cycle is allowed only for Monthly, Daily and Weekly Frequencies
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISNULL(loan__Frequency_Cycle__c) ) ,OR(loan__Frequency_Cycle__c <= 0 , AND( loan__Frequency_Cycle__c > 1,OR(ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Bi-weekly'), ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Semi-Monthly'), ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Bi-Monthly'), ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Quarterly'), ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Semi-Annual'), ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Annual'), ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Billing Frequency'), ISPICKVAL(loan__Frequency__c, 'Single-Payment')))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Kindly Add correct Value for Frequency Cycle , Either value is less than or equal to zero, or selected Payment Frequency is not supported.
